name: Crisp Plugin
description: ChatGPT Bot trained on your website data
primary_feature_0: Make LLMs aware of your custom data
primary_feature_1: A chatbot trained on your data in minutes
primary_feature_2: The Crisp Plugin, make it very easy to train a chatbot on your company data.
feature_0_description:
We automatically get your website pages.
Other data sources are available too 
(e.g. PDF, Gdoc, Sheets, Notion, Airtable, etc...)
feature_1_description: After collecting your data, we process it and train your bot. Don’t worry, it’s fast ⚡️
feature_2_description:
The final step is to install the Crisp. 
Now your website is spiced up 
with some AI magic ✨
feature_3_description:
We keep the bot up to date with your data. 
We automatically synch your data when possible.
 You can also setup a webhook or manually trigger a synch.
